text: <$set name=imgs filter="[tag[img]]"> <$list filter="[enlist]" variable="img"> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible" tag="div" actions=""" <$action-spotlight $images=<> $start=<> />"""> <$image source=<> />
title: Spotlight: Example 3
caption: Using image tiddlers as a source for a lightbox.
description: The tiddlers are specified by a tag and can be embedded images or external images specified in the `_canonical_uri` field.
